overview:
Valerie Gombart, Member of the Board of Seventure Partners, began her career as an analyst at Banque Populaire Croation, the Banque Populaire Group’s seed capital fund. She was involved in the launch of the first FCPI fund in France in 1997 and has since invested over â‚¬50 million in innovative new companies. Valerie Gombart is a graduate of Audencia, with a postgraduate diploma in financial engineering law. Valerie is head of Seventure Partners’ ICT investment team.

Valerie was involved in the financing and is a board member of Maximiles (Alternext), Memscap (Eurolist C), VistaPrint (Nasdaq) and Parrot (Eurolist B) from their early stages to IPO.

Valerie is currently a board member of Airtag, Easyvoyage, Sefas, Quescom, Volubill and Xiring.

relationships.title: Member of the Board, Head of ICT Departement
